title: Loan Disbursement Analysis
description: Power BI dashboard tracking loan approval rates, disbursement timelines, and risk analysis for optimized lending operations.

title: Revenue and Customer Ageing Analysis
description: Power BI solution analyzing revenue patterns and customer account aging to improve cash flow management and collection strategies.

title: Restaurant Analytics Dashboard
description: Comprehensive Power BI dashboard for restaurant performance tracking, including sales trends, menu item popularity, and operational efficiency metrics.

title: Data Quality & KPI Analytics
description: Power BI solution for monitoring data quality metrics and key performance indicators to ensure reliable business intelligence.

title: Tableau to Power BI Migration
description: End-to-end migration of reporting systems from Tableau to Power BI with optimized data models and enhanced visualization capabilities.

title: HR Analytics Recruitment Analysis
description: Power BI dashboard transforming flat file data into a star schema for comprehensive recruitment analytics and hiring effectiveness tracking.
